00037 #include "egs_scoring.h"
00038 #include "egs_functions.h"
00039 
00040 #include <string>
00041 using std::string;
00042 
00043 EGS_ScoringArray::EGS_ScoringArray(int N) :
00044     current_ncase(0), current_ncase_65536(0), current_ncase_short(0) {
00045     if (N <= 0) egsFatal("EGS_ScoringArray::EGS_ScoringArray:\n"
00046                              "   attempt to construct a scoring array with non-positive size\n");
00047     result = new EGS_ScoringSingle [N];
00048     nreg = N;
00049 }
00050 
00051 EGS_ScoringArray::~EGS_ScoringArray() {
00052     delete [] result;
00053 }
00054 
00055 void EGS_ScoringArray::setHistory(EGS_I64 ncase) {
00056     if (ncase != current_ncase) {
00057         current_ncase = ncase;
00058         EGS_I64 aux = ncase >> 16;
00059         if (aux != current_ncase_65536) {
00060             current_ncase_65536 = aux;
00061             for (int j=0; j<nreg; j++) {
00062                 result[j].finishCase(0,0);
00063             }
00064         }
00065         aux = ncase - (aux << 16);
00066         unsigned short aux1 = (unsigned short) aux;
00067         current_ncase_short = aux1;
00068     }
00069 }
00070 
00071 void EGS_ScoringArray::reportResults(double norm, const char *title,
00072                                      bool relative_error, const char *format) {
00073     if (title) egsInformation("\n\n%s for %d particles:\n\n",title,
00074                                   current_ncase);
00075     if (current_ncase < 2) {
00076         egsWarning("EGS_ScoringArray::reportResults: you must run more than 2 "
00077                    "histories\n\n");
00078         return;
00079     }
00080     char c = (relative_error) ? '%' : ' ';
00081     string myformat = "  %d    %g  +/-  %g %c\n";
00082     const char *oformat = format ? format : myformat.c_str();
00083     for (int j=0; j<nreg; j++) {
00084         double r,dr;
00085         result[j].currentResult(current_ncase,r,dr);
00086         if (relative_error) {
00087             dr = (r > 0) ? 100*dr/r : 100;
00088         }
00089         else {
00090             dr *= norm;
00091         }
00092         egsInformation(oformat,j,r*norm,dr,c);
00093     }
00094 }
